page.title: 02FARMLAND AROUND SLOUGH
page.content: The farms in our area are{Bell Farm, {Berry Farm}and{Stoke Farm.} Bell Farm is a{poultry}farm. Berry Farm keeps stables for other people's{horses}and a few hens, chickens etc.. Neither of these farms grow crops. The land at Berry Farm is used for the horses to graze on. Some of the fields at Bell Farm are used for the{cows}of another farm to graze on. Bell Farm and Berry Farm are close together and know each other. A majority of the land in our area is used for grazing cattle and horses. A few years ago Bell Farm sold part of their land to a{property} {developer.} This land was eventually used to enlarge the land used by Wexham Park Golf Club.
